meanings.sent1: The fillings of the cake were done carefully by the baker.
meanings.sent2: I watched as the fillings of the form were completed.
meanings.sent3: The fillings of the bucket were so full that they spilled over.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the fillings of joy in a room.
meanings.sent5: The fillings of the jar overflowed with colorful beads.

meanings.sent1: The dentist used silver fillings to fix the cavity.
meanings.sent2: The pillow was soft and fluffy with down fillings.
meanings.sent3: The fillings of the mattress made it extra comfortable.
meanings.sent4: His words were like the fillings of a broken promise.
meanings.sent5: The fillings of the sandwich oozed out with melted cheese.

meanings.definition: Food used as a filling in a sandwich or pastry.
meanings.sent1: The turkey and cheese fillings in the sandwich were delicious.
meanings.sent2: I love the apple fillings in the pie my grandma makes.
meanings.sent3: The fillings of the taco spilled out as he took a big bite.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the sweet fillings of a cupcake.
meanings.sent5: The chocolate fillings in the croissant melted in my mouth.
